name: Boom Blox
overview: Throw, Grab and BLAST your way to VICTORY! From Steven Spielberg and EA comes a wild, Blox-busting extravaganza! • Over 300 levels set in five action-packed worlds. • Take on single-player or multiplayer co-op and versus gameplay with up to four players at once • Tweak any level or build your own then share them over WiiConnect24.
